sections.paragraph: எல்லா, அனைவரும், சகல, பலவித, யாவரும், சதா, சர்வ, எந்த, யாவையும், முழு, எங்கும், எப்பொழுதும் - பெயரடை

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole: - all (manner of, means) alway (-s), any (one), X daily, + ever, every (one, way), as many as, + no (-thing), X throughly, whatsoever, whole, whosoever.
